svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2024-05-08T10:40:47.501Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/122.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="60e70716793133e9-4" value="<div style="font-size: 9px;"><b style="font-size: 9px;">Arten der</b></div><b style="font-size: 9px;">Textklassifikation</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=9;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="170" width="130" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="60e70716793133e9-9" value="Zuordnung&nbsp;<div style="font-size: 9px;">eines Labels</div><div style="font-size: 9px;">(single label)</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=9;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="130" y="240" width="110" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="60e70716793133e9-11" value="<b style="font-size: 9px;">binäre <br style="font-size: 9px;">Klassifikation</b>&nbsp;<div style="font-size: 9px;">(Zahl der Labels insgesamt = 2)</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=9;align=center;spacing=6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="310" width="100" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ajBJ9Fd-rrTFB4zsY5iu-2" value="Zuordnung <br style="font-size: 9px;">mehrerer Labels möglich<div>(multi label)</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=9;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="380" y="240" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ajBJ9Fd-rrTFB4zsY5iu-3" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;fontSize=9;" parent="1" source="60e70716793133e9-4" target="ajBJ9Fd-rrTFB4zsY5iu-2" id="ajBJ9Fd-rrTFB4zsY5iu-4" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontSize=9;" parent="1" source="60e70716793133e9-9" target="60e70716793133e9-4" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="203" y="210" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="253" y="160" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ajBJ9Fd-rrTFB4zsY5iu-6" value="<b style="font-size: 9px;">multiclass Klassifikation</b> <br style="font-size: 9px;">(Zahl der Labels insgesamt &gt; 2)" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=9;align=center;spacing=6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="190" y="310" width="100" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ajBJ9Fd-rrTFB4zsY5iu-7" value="<b style="font-size: 9px;">multilabel Klassifikation&nbsp;</b><div style="font-size: 9px;"><b style="font-size: 9px;">binär</b><br style="font-size: 9px;"><div style="font-size: 9px;">(Vorhersage für jedes Label einzeln, <br style="font-size: 9px;">Liste der Labels änderbar)</div></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=9;align=center;spacing=6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="310" width="130" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ajBJ9Fd-rrTFB4zsY5iu-8" value="<b style="font-size: 9px;">multilabel Klassifikation&nbsp;</b><div style="font-size: 9px;"><b style="font-size: 9px;">multinomial</b><br style="font-size: 9px;"><div style="font-size: 9px;">(Vorhersage für alle Labels insgesamt, <br style="font-size: 9px;">Liste der Labels<br style="font-size: 9px;">nicht änderbar)</div></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=9;align=center;spacing=6;" parent="1"
